explanation: To determine whether add_session_cookie is (directly or indirectly) recursive you must inspect every function it can call transitively. add_session_cookie calls MHD_add_response_header, so you need MHD_add_response_header itself and each function it calls (its direct callees). Any of those could call back into add_session_cookie (or call further functions that do), completing a cycle and violating the MISRA rule. The listed symbols are exactly the immediate transitive callees shown in the static call graph; their implementations and further call-edges must be examined to prove absence or presence of an indirect call back to add_session_cookie.
